Dear friend, I don't think that any team in the world will perform at one time I mean all the players. At least half of players can perform we can easily beat Australia in sri lanka. let's hope @ least 2 or 3 batters to get big runs and 2 ,3 bowlers to take that aus wicket s , turning track s will suit for rangana and Sandakan. I don't think sri Lankan seamers can do any match winning performance in these conditions.
Hariyata hari ape rata ethulema apita den dinanna wela thiyenne maara kattak kala.eka match ekak dinuwa kiyala anek adu padu amathaka karannethuwa hoda team ekak hada ganna ona.
dannathi awa katha karanna epa. Lakshan Sandakan wicket 07 gaththa. Chandimalui Dhananjaya Silvai Kusal Mendista honda support ekak dunna. habayi ape operners lanamwadak na.
Congratulations Sri Lankan team !!!! well played Kusal Mendis, Lakshan Sandakan & Rangana Herath.... <3
Well done ! Feel sorry for Muralis Father...

Can't be any happier than this. Specially the way we fought from behind. Hats off to Kusal Mendis & Herath. Sadakan & Dananjaya are good inclusions. Both had a good game. No point wasting & trying same failed players again and again. Give youngsters more chances. Need Dimuth, Kaushal & Kusal perera to click in this series. if that happens, with the momentum, we are difficult team to beat on this series. I have seen Australian media kicking steven smith's ass off with their reports. Can't be any happy. It's been coming for some time. If it's like this, it's worth waiting. Sri Lanka is never short of talent. keep producing amazing talents. Good luck boys! win it for the SL fans.

Kusal mendis Change the game single handedly, if that inning not happen, result is completely different. Except kusal mendis other all the batters failed. Need at least 2 or 3 batters to get big runs. We appreciate to the selection that not include MR.THIRIMANNA.
Lankawe kollo wasai ... cricket kuru dekata kadai !!! good luck sri lanka !!!!

Well done boys. This proves that fans knew cricket more than the selectors. Fan were demanding for Sandakan, Roshen, Dhananjaya like players for years and selectors were preoccupied with their fantasy cricket world where Thirimanna is the best batsman in the world, Senanayaka, Rambukwella are the best spinners in the world. Sooner or later we need to get rid of current two openers. Sri Lanka is always in good hands when proper selections were made. Imagine when the team in its full potential when Chameera, Prasad, Vandersay is in I thin we have good enough team to beat any team.
